item.title: Gaining Intuition for Identification Constraints in Bayesian IRT Models: Part I
item.description: I’ve spent considerable time developing JAGS/Stan code for fitting Bayesian IRT models; understanding/resolving identification constraints has to be one of the most frustrating stages in the workflow. We’ll start off with the simple Rasch model: $$ \theta $$
